phrs.translation: 卫生局, 健康部, 部门, 安全及健康局
变本加厉地使用钱夹钱包午夜

sentences.sentence: I am thinking more of the people out there who still have dosh.
sentences.translation: 我更加关注那些手上还有点钱的人。

sentences.sentence: Until this mindset changes, BitCoin will be no rival to real-world dosh.
sentences.translation: 除非这种心态改变，不然比特币将不再是现实货币的对手。

sentences.sentence: I had so little dosh that I could not even afford the bus fare, so I walked home.
sentences.translation: 我的钱太少了，甚至不够买公共汽车票，所以我走着回家。
